about_the_game:
"Ray: Part 1" immerses players into the role of Ray, a seasoned mercenary, in a revamped rendition of the iconic 2003 Newgrounds hit. This fully voiced, updated remake delivers an enriched narrative experience with enhanced graphics, where decisions resonate throughout the story, shaping the trajectory of Ray.

Navigate through the gritty underworld of 1990s Miami, where players engage in a variety of activities, including making choices, playing minigames, and experiencing multiple endings as the consequence of your actions.

Players are tasked with not only making pivotal decisions but also managing resources such as purchasing items and paying off bribes, adding additional layers to the gameplay experience. As the narrative unfolds, players witness the far-reaching implications of their choices, ensuring that each playthrough remains engaging. "Ray: Part 1" promises to captivate both fans of the original game and newcomers alike, offering a compelling blend of nostalgia and innovation.
